title: Cellular RF Receiver Systems Engineer - System Feature, Algorithm and Calibration development
summary: At Apple, we work every day to craft products that enrich people’s lives. Join our dynamic group and contribute to upcoming products that will delight millions of Apple’s customers daily. Apple's RF Systems Engineering team is looking for a passionate expert with a track record in RF receiver system engineering.
description: In this role as RF Receiver System Engineer, you will define specifications for Cellular RF receiver line-ups, develop algorithms, and calibration routines to control signal quality and mitigate RF impairments. You will collaborate with various teams to drive RF technology innovation for next-generation wireless components.
key_qualifications: 3+ years of experience in Cellular/RF Systems Engineering, knowledge of receiver architectures, cellular radio standards, RF circuit impairments, RF algorithms, Matlab, object-oriented programming languages, digital signal processing, analytical thinking, and collaboration skills.
education_experience: BS and a minimum of 10 years relevant industry experience
